_comment: MCP servers recommended for the Tafkeer workflow. These are references - actual servers must be configured in your main MCP config.

linear.description: Linear issue tracking - required for /feature command and issue management

serena.description: Semantic code analysis - enhances type scanning and code understanding

notes.linear_setup: Run /mcp to authenticate Linear. Required labels will be created automatically.
notes.serena_setup: Serena requires project activation. Use activate_project tool after connecting.
notes.fallback: Most features work without MCP servers using bash commands as fallback.
